title: A Christmas Feast and other stories
description: A delicious Christmas feast of short stories from the Sunday Times No. 1 bestselling author of A French Affair and The Perfect Match.Add some extra sparkle to your Christmas by joining Katie Fforde for a perfect, romantic Christmas feast of short stories. Collected together for the first time and including one brand new story.Make your Christmas wishes come true...Includes and exclusive sneak preview of Katie's new novel, A Vintage Wedding, coming in February 2015.
author: Katie Fforde
